overview: Bykea is Pakistan's leading on-demand transport and logistics platform. Our Corporate Services division helps businesses manage logistics, employee travel, and cash-on-delivery (COD) efficiently. We offer a dedicated web portal, API integration for e-commerce, and monthly invoicing for seamless operations in Karachi, Lahore, and Islamabad.

pricing.delivery_rates: Base fare starts from PKR 100 within city limits. Dynamic pricing applies based on distance and peak hours.
pricing.cash_on_delivery: Standard COD remittance fee is 1.5% of the collected amount or a flat fee, depending on volume.
pricing.subscription: No monthly subscription fee for the Corporate Portal access.
pricing.bulk_discounts: Volume-based discounts available for businesses with over 500 deliveries per month.

faqs.question: Which cities do you operate in?
faqs.answer: We currently operate in Karachi, Lahore, Islamabad, and Rawalpindi.

faqs.question: Do you offer API integration?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide open APIs that allow you to integrate Bykea booking and tracking directly into your website or app.

faqs.question: How does Cash on Delivery remittance work?
faqs.answer: Riders collect cash from your customers upon delivery. The amount is remitted to your bank account within 24-48 hours (T+1 or T+2 cycle).

faqs.question: Can I track my riders?
faqs.answer: Yes, our Corporate Dashboard provides real-time tracking for all your active rides and deliveries.

faqs.question: Is there insurance for parcels?
faqs.answer: Basic insurance is included. For high-value items, we offer enhanced insurance coverage upon request.
